mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CIRCULATION ( CIRCULATION_NO, STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, INPUT_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, CIRCULATION_AMOUNT, CIRCULATION_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CIR.NEXTVAL, #{storeNo}, #{circulation.productNo}, #{circulation.inputPrice}, #{circulation.salePrice}, #{circulation.circulationAmount}, DEFAULT, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(CIRCULATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MINUTE_GROUP FROM CIRCULATION WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND STATUS = 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CIRCULATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )

SELECT RNUM, MINUTE_GROUP, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_INPUT_PRICE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, MINUTE_GROUP, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_INPUT_PRICE FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(CIRCULATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MINUTE_GROUP, SUM(CIRCULATION_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, SUM(CIRCULATION_AMOUNT * INPUT_PRICE) AS TOTAL_INPUT_PRICE FROM CIRCULATION WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND STATUS = 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CIRCULATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(CIRCULATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ) ) ORDER BY RNUM DESC
